item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, April 13, 2025 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Experimental release of GrapheneOS for Pixel 9a (175 points | 85 comments)
2. BPS is a GPS alternative that nobody's heard of (157 points | 53 comments)
3. Show HN: BSE – Semantic Zip Engine for Text, Image and Audio (6 points | discuss)
4. How to not build a two stage model rocket (37 points | 1 comment)
5. A Farewell to the ArcoLinux University (35 points | 5 comments)
6. Nice things with SVG (387 points | 67 comments)
7. Show HN: Chonky – a neural approach for text semantic chunking (4 points | discuss)
8. WebTUI – A CSS Library That Brings the Beauty of Terminal UIs to the Browser (127 points | 23 comments)
9. YAML: The Norway Problem (2022) (114 points | 60 comments)
10. 33-year-old AmigaOS for Commodore computers gets an unexpected update News (44 points | 4 comments)
11. I ditched my laptop for a pocketable mini PC and a pair of AR glasses (98 points | 73 comments)
12. Emacs Lisp Elements (241 points | 30 comments)
13. How to repair the parts that explode in Lenovo Yoga laptops (15 points | 6 comments)
14. Show HN: memEx, a personal knowledge base inspired by zettlekasten and org-mode (133 points | 20 comments)
15. Monty Python and the Holy Grail became a comedy legend (28 points | 5 comments)
16. Open source and self hostable/private file converter (488 points | 91 comments)
17. Anubis Works (185 points | 105 comments)
18. Why is there a “small house” in IBM's Code page 437? (132 points | 35 comments)
19. Dust in the wind: How cities alter natural airborne particles (17 points | 1 comment)
20. CERN releases report on the feasibility of a possible Future Circular Collider (86 points | 60 comments)
21. ESA has a commercial launch strategy, but will member states pay? (8 points | 3 comments)
22. How to Structure a B2B Marketplace Venture (25 points | discuss)
23. ArkType: Ergonomic TS validator 100x faster than Zod (143 points | 53 comments)
24. Tunarr: Create and configure live TV channels from media on your servers (168 points | 44 comments)
25. Cross-Entropy and KL Divergence (4 points | discuss)
26. The Bitter Prediction (95 points | 58 comments)
27. Ambient music on iOS 18.4 and the return to the Apple's Music app (33 points | 18 comments)
28. Trump exempts phones, computers, chips from ‘reciprocal’ tariffs (266 points | 556 comments)
29. Shadertoys Ported to Rust GPU (68 points | 24 comments)
30. Artie (YC S23) Is Hiring Engineer #3 ( | hide)
